QuestData.Title: Gidwin's Fate Revealed
QuestData.Description: Quickly - find an entrance to the slaughterhouse to our south. I will meet you on the inside.$b$bBe ready for a fight!
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Gidwin Goldbraids within the slaughterhouse in central Plaguewood.
QuestData.RewardText: You have no idea how happy I am to see you two! You're a sight for sore eyes... sore eyes that have been starin' through a banshee for far too long now.$b$bI'm sorry for causing so much trouble. Will you take me back to the caravan?
